anime.description: In the comedic adventures of Naked Wolves, the central character, a sumo wrestler named Mikoshiarashi, travels around the world acquiring top secret sumo techniques as well as friendship with strong wrestlers on his road to becoming an invincible YOKOZUNA - The Grand Sumo Champion.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

episode.title: 初場所
New Year`s Tournament
episode.summary: Mikoshiarashi and Tetsunoshiki were mawashi wearing middle schoolers who would practice sumo every day by the river on their way home. Scouted by a sumo master, both of them trained hard every day. Finally, during the final match of the New Year`s Grand Sumo Tournament, Mikoshiarashi must fight his friend Tetsunoshiki for the title, but is completely defeated. Disappointed but not discouraged, Mikoshiarashi consults his Sumo Boss for advice... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千秋楽 後編
Final Tournament - Part 2
episode.summary: Arashi vs. Tetsunishiki. Two old friends battle for the championship, to prove themselves as the strongest sumo wrestler in the world. Arashi is up against his toughest opponent, but will Tetsunishiki`s body hold up long enough to claim victory? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ニューヨーク場所
New York Tournament
episode.summary: Tricked by a taxi cab driver, Arashi-kun is in dire need of money, stranded in the middle of New York City. With no where else to turn, he enters a funky dance contest, only to find that the local dance legend, Bootsy, may hold the secret to one of the 48 techniques... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: L.A.場所
L.A. Tournament
episode.summary: In search of the 48 secret techniques, Mikoshiarashi travels to L.A. where his attire gets him in trouble immediately. Thankfully, he is saved by the master of distortion rock, Breaky, who might have a thing or two to teach the young sumo wrestler... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モントリオール場所
Montreal Tournament
episode.summary: Hitchhiking up north in Canada, Arashi-kun passes out in a sudden blizzard, but is saved by the girlfriend of Canadian Ice Hockey Star Justin. Justin is none too pleased about his girl taking in another man, and challenges Mikoshiarashi to a one-on-one hockey showdown! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワシントンD.C.場所
D.C. Tournament
episode.summary: While visiting the White House, Arashi is mistakenly arrested for being the ringleader of a terrorist organization. But thanks to his keen eye, he helps Edgar, the nation`s top FBI watchdog, apprehend the real mastermind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クリーブランド場所
Cleveland Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is scouted by the manager for the New York Nyankees for his amazing arm, and the home run king of the Cleveland Iideyansu, Rodry, is seriously mad at having his spotlight taken away. This grudge can only be settled in one way: Baseball! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キューバ場所
Cuba Tournament
episode.summary: Still feeling quite happy after his Mexican wrestling adventure, Arashi talks back to a Cuban military patrol and is thrown into jail along with other political prisoners. Never giving up hope, they wait for the day their hero, Guevaran, will lead an attack to rescue them... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メキシコ場所
Mexico Tournament
episode.summary: After being introduced to the wonders of tequila at a Mexican bar, Arashi is taken in by a mysterious masked wrestler who recruits Arashi as his new partner. Could this be the birth of the ultimate Lucha tag-team? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャマイカ場所
Jamaica Tournament
episode.summary: Impressed by the sites and tastes of the island, Arashi is faced with a choice between two restaurants. But it seems the entire country is on the verge of a civil war between two political parties. Could the music of the master rastafarian, Bob, calm the masses? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リオデジャネイロ場所
Rio de Janeiro Tournament
episode.summary: It`s the day before a dance carnival in Rio, and one team`s main dancer has gone missing! Can Arashi learn the secret behind the samba in only 1 night of practice? Can he get over the embarrassment of wearing such gaudy outfits? Can a sumo wrestler shake his hips like that in the first place? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アマゾン場所
Amazon Tournament
episode.summary: Hearing news of a mysterious hermit that lives deep in the Amazon Jungle, Arashi goes to see him in search of another one of the 48 techniques. But will he become one with nature, or just fish food? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コロンビア場所
Columbia Tournament
episode.summary: In a rush to get to the airport, Arashi gets on the wrong bus. When that bus breaks down near a coffee plantation, Arashi heads to a famous local coffee shop. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルゼンチン場所
Argentina Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is looking forward to getting on board a cruise ship, but all the tickets are sold out. With no where else to turn, he offers to help out a young man who says he knows the captain of the ship, but... can a sumo wrestler dance the tango? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カリブ海場所
Caribbean Sea Tournament
episode.summary: Enjoying his Atlantic cruise, Arashi hears rumors of a vicious pirate named Hawk who has been attacking ships. There`s no way he`d actually attack this ship though... right?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パンプローナ場所
Pamplona Tournament
episode.summary: Arriving finally in Europe, Arashi is transfixed by all the beautiful women. Catching one, on the other hand, proves to be quite a challenge... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大西洋場所
Atlantic Ocean Tournament
episode.summary: Having successfully beaten off the pirates, Arashi is back on his way to Europe. But Captain Hawk wants revenge! Arashi and the rest of the ship is saved at the last moment by a gallant explorer... Maybe he can teach Arashi a thing or two? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バルセロナ場所
Barcelona Tournament
episode.summary: Back in Japan, Arashi`s rival Tetsunishiki is racking up wins in the sumo world. A mysterious architect helps Arashi regain his motivation to keep going on his quest to become the greatest sumo wrestler in the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パリ場所
Paris Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi becomes quick pals with Emperor Napoleonne, and offers to help him invade Italy by crossing the Alps. Thanks to their indomitable spirit, they overcome the shear ludicrousness of the concept and somehow emerge victorious. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パリコレ場所
Paris Collection Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi confronts a man secretly taking pictures of him around Paris, and it turns out he`s a budding photographer who`s just really shy. Arashi offers to be his practice subject, and gets scouted to be the next top model. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブルゴーニュ場所
Bourgogne Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi sits down for a nice full course French meal, but seems to not understand how to properly savor the experience. At a local winery, he learns the secret to using all 5 of his sense... Not just for enjoying food and wine, but for sumo wrestling as well! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロンドン場所
London Tournament
episode.summary: After running into a funny, boy-like character in a London pub, Arashi is taken to "pure heart land," an island where kids never grow up. But just as he arrives, the evil Captain Hoo-kun appears... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スコットランド場所
Scotland Tournament
episode.summary: Outside a stately mansion, Arashi is caught up in a murder investigation. Can the ultimate detective, Holmeslock, solve the crime and prove Arashi`s innocence? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シュトゥットガルド場所
Stuttgart Tournament
episode.summary: Entering Germany for the first time, Arashi feels like having a beer, but gets in a car accident while trying to save a puppy. Arashi is fine, but the car is another story... Can the genius car engineer Merben analyze the secret behind what makes Arashi`s body so strong? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヘッセン場所
Hesse Tournament
episode.summary: In search of a local map, Arashi encounters a strange fellow who throws him into the world of a fairy tale! Can Arashi live happily ever after? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルプス場所
Alps Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi meets up with a small girl and helps her carry some heavy bags back to her cabin in the Alps. Inside the cabin, however, is a familiar face... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋愛場所
Love Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi arrives in Italy, and tries to find his childhood friend Hikaru-chan, who he heard was in the country. Arashi makes a scene and spots Hikaru-chan in the crowd, but she runs away, leading him to the Colosseum. What could Hikaru-chan be trying to tell Arashi? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スイス場所
Switzerland Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi`s in Switzerland, the land of banks, but plum out of cash. Heading to a bank to withdraw some money, Arashi is caught up in an attempted robbery, and meets Meister, a master Swiss watchmaker. Meister helps Arashi with a complete tune-up: Of both his watch, and his body. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャンピオンズトーナメント場所①
Champion`s Tournament - Preliminaries
episode.summary: Arashi enters a tournament taking place in the Colosseum to determine the greatest warrior in all of Europe. With over 100 fierce warriors vying for the title, an incredible free for-all begins to pick the 8 finalists. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャンピオンズトーナメント場所②
Champion`s Tournament - Finals
episode.summary: Arashi has gotten past the tournament preliminaries, and the 8 finalists pair off in the quarter-finals. Nachopulco, Gugliel, and Arashi up against Porunga, Gargon, and Usshishi! Who will make it to the semi-finals? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャンピオンズトーナメント場所③
Champion`s Tournament - Conclusion
episode.summary: Mikoshiarashi vs. Porunga, Gugliel vs. Julius! It`s the semi-finals and final match-up in the Champion`s Tournament, and only the warrior who can master not only his own power, but that of the heavens itself may prevail. Fight on, Naked Wolves! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オーストリア場所
Austria Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is invited to a feast at the Austrian court in honor of his victory at the Champion`s Tournament, and he runs into the world`s greatest composer, Mozun. The ever polite Arashi is asked to help teach Mozun some manners, but ends up becoming the inspiration for his latest symphony instead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スウェーデン場所
Sweden Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is going for a walk in Sweden when suddenly a nearby house explodes! Sir Nobelson, a scientist inventor, has finally completed his greatest invention, dynamite, to help his friend finish building a tunnel. But there are people who would use such power for evil in this world... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フィンランド場所
Finland Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is in Finland on Christmas Eve, when he happens upon Santa`s workshop! Arashi is eager to help deliver presents but Santa seems somewhat different than how he had imagined him to be... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロシア場所
Russia Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi goes for a swim in a heated pool to warm up from the cold of the Moscow`s winter, when he encounters a group of synchronized swimmers. The leader of the group, Elschenko, tries to recruit Arashi into the group, but he thinks the sport is too feminine. Arashi soon learns that displays of grace require incredible strength out of sight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルーマニア場所
Romania Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is lost in a dark forest somewhere in Romania, when he comes across a kind young woman who offers to let him rest in her house. It seems that she`s just happy to finally have a visitor she can talk to... Or rather, suck from? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギリシャ場所
Greece Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi pays a visit to the Parthenon and stumbles upon a meeting of the gods. Sent as a representative of humanity to Hades, Arashi must convince Hadus, the lord of the underworld, that humanity is worth saving. This might be one bout Arashi can`t win through force... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トルコ場所
Turkey Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi ventures into Istanbul, where he heads to a local sauna for a bath. But he runs into the divine oily god of Turkish Sumo, Ozman. Which Sumo with rein supreme?! Watch out, Arashi... He`s a slippery one! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エジプト場所
Egypt Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is wandering in the desert, desperately searching for some water, when he comes across some giant pyramids being built. He helps with the construction in exchange for some water, and meets King Phara-oh. But when Cleonpatran shows up, Phara-oh runs off for some reason... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケニア場所
Kenya Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi marvels at the natural beauty of the savanna, that is, until a lion almost eats him! Saved by the head of the local village, Elmoran, Arashi helps hunt Big Daddy, a giant lion that`s been attacking people. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 南アフリカ場所
South Africa Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi comes upon a diamond mine and gets caught up in an attack by a group of armed smugglers. What`s worth more: A 32 carat diamond or a human life? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アブダビ場所
Abu Dhabi Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi sees a young boy being bullied on the street and saves him. The boy is so impressed that he asks Arashi if he can be his disciple! But the boy`s father turns out to be Badri, the world`s greatest oil baron. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: インド場所
India Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is in India, and of course the first thing on his plate is curry. But into the same restaurant walks Shaiva, a dancing star with an incredible appetite. Arashi meets up with Shaiva again near the Ganges River, but an encounter with a cobra puts him and Shaiva is a tight spot! Can Arashi learn that sometimes you have to destroy yourself to overcome your own limits? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイ場所
Thailand Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi arrives in Thailand, and gets picked up by a tour guide in a Tuk-Tuk taxi. After seeing a giant Buddha and riding an elephant, he`s taken to see some Thai boxing. Inspired, Arashi challenges the King of the Super Heavyweights, Pappon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モンゴル場所
Mongolia Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi finds himself in Mongolia, a rival country in the sport of sumo wrestling, but something seems amiss in the village. It seems a single man has been going around challenging all the villages to a sumo bout with the entire village on the line! Arashi heads out to stop this person, and to learn from a powerful foe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 韓国場所
Korea Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is in Korea, which means Korean food! While chowing down the local cuisine, he overhears a tearful scene between two lovers, split apart by circumstance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 中国場所
China Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is in China, and is mistaken for Zhuge Liang by Liu Long and his followers Fei Chang and Yu Guan. Arashi volunteers to go to ask Qiān Sun to form an alliance with Liu Long in order to defeat the evil Chancellor Cao Cāng Cāng. Can Arashi help unite the country? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マカオ場所
Macao Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is drawn to the glittering lights of Macao`s casinos, and runs into an old friend, Badri! The two of them get on a huge winning streak, and attract the attention of the owner of the casino, the genius gambler Hoho, who invites Arashi for a personal duel... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オーストラリア場所
Australia Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is in Australia after Hoho mentions he heard one of the 48 secret techniques is there. Not having any other clues, Arashi stumbles upon a kangaroo ranch, where he gets to fight an opponent far stronger than any human... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハワイ場所
Hawaii Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi is chilling out in Hawaii, when he sees a local surfer popular with all the girls. Arashi dismisses him as a flirt picking up girls and calls surfing silly, and Duke challenges him to show his skills on the surfboard. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東京場所
Tokyo Tournament
episode.summary: Arashi returns to Tokyo, summoned there for a rematch with his childhood friend, Tetsunishiki by his sumo boss, Coach. But when he arrives, he realizes that he has only learned 47 of the 48 secret techniques! To obtain the final piece, Arashi must defeat a legendary Yokozuna in Sumo history... Coach himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千秋楽 前編
Final Tournament - Part 1
episode.summary: The final tournament is here, and Arashi is making good use of all the techniques he`s learned from his travels, racking up an unbeaten record. His friend and rival also cannot be touched, but even outside of the ring he acts cold to his old friend. Arashi is worried that Te-chan has become a whole different person in the year he`s been away... Source: crunchyroll
